text: The ball fell into the basement from a broken glass. A 14-year-old girl, the janitor's daughter, came down to pick her up, limp. A tram had cut off a leg from the poor girl, and she was very happy when she could do someone a favor. The basement was in darkness, but he noticed that in a corner something had moved. - What's that? "Tell the stick-foot girl, what are you doing here? He grabbed the ball and got out of the basement as fast as he could. The ugly, smelly old rat had been taken by a cat and was stunned. I've never heard anyone talk to you like that before. Now, for the first time, she thought everything would have gone differently if she had been born a cat. It's more like we're so insatiable! What if she was born a stick-to-stick girl? But this was too pretty and he didn't even dare to imagine it. FIN
title: Pensamientos en el sótano
author: István Örkény
